# jsj-lazyload-img
懒加载图片组件

```tsx
// react写法
import { JsjLazyloadImg } from 'jsj-common/dist/react'
```

```html
<jsj-lazyload-img src="https://ss3.bdstatic.com/70cFv8Sh_Q1YnxGkpoWK1HF6hhy/it/u=1007058321,2005177140&fm=26&gp=0.jpg" />
```

<div>
<jsj-lazyload-img src="https://ss3.bdstatic.com/70cFv8Sh_Q1YnxGkpoWK1HF6hhy/it/u=1007058321,2005177140&fm=26&gp=0.jpg" />

</div>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description | Type     | Default                                                                                           |
| ------------- | -------------- | ----------- | -------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `alt`         | `alt`          | img标签alt说明  | `string` | `undefined`                                                                                       |
| `lazyloadImg` | `lazyload-img` | 懒加载图片默认图片链接 | `string` | `'https://ss1.bdstatic.com/70cFvXSh_Q1YnxGkpoWK1HF6hhy/it/u=3307227625,902309094&fm=26&gp=0.jpg'` |
| `src`         | `src`          | src链接地址     | `string` | `undefined`                                                                                       |


----------------------------------------------

jsj-common，一个强大的组件库
